Talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Huh. <sp:5:1:0>It looks just like horse's skeleton,<sp:5:0:0>
but what happens to the carrot after it
gets chewed up?
Talk0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>Ahhh. <sp:5:0:0>There's no more room in my
head for anything but thoughts of that
giant stallion.<sp:0:4:0>Not even the whole thing! It's so big that
the neck and tail don't fit in my mental
image of it.<sp:0:4:0>Thank you for letting me see the full
breadth of what a horse can be.
Talk0028: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>That horse...<sp:5:1:0>that HORSE!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:7d00>It's even bigger than I imagined!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>Ahhh. <sp:5:0:0>There's no more room in my
head for anything but thoughts of that
giant stallion.<sp:0:4:0>Not even the whole thing! It's so big that
the neck and tail don't fit in my mental
image of it.<sp:0:4:0>Thank you for letting me see the full
breadth of what a horse can be.
Talk0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This doesn't make you a bigger horse fan
than me, mind you.
Talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>The widely rumored giant stallion...<sp:0:4:0>The horse that's whinnied to me in
my dreams...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>There it is, in the flesh. <sp:5:1:0>It's giant! It's a
horse! It's a giant horse!<sp:0:4:0>I've never felt so lucky to be alive.
Talk9002:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>That crystal is mine. You've got no right
to just up and take it.
Talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_01>Thank you so much for introducing me to
this wonderful, once-in-a-lifetime horse.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>How can I possibly thank you enough?<sp:5:0:0>
What if I gave you this nice, shiny crystal?<sp:0:4:0>I picked it up as I was passing through.<sp:0:4:0>I was thinking about using it to deck out
my horse to make it the best-looking
beast the world's ever seen.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>But when I saw that giant stallion you
showed me, I realized I'd been a fool.<sp:0:4:0>There's no improving on a horse—any
horse. They're perfect to begin with.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>So I won't be needing the crystal. <sp:5:0:0>You can
do whatever you like with it.
Talk9004:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>Try all you like, but you'll never put one
over on me. <sp:5:0:0>That crystal is mine, got it?!
Talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>What just happened?! <sp:5:0:0>The crystal up and
fired this beam of light out of nowhere.
Talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Oh, yeah, almost forgot. <sp:5:0:0>Did you need
something from me?
Talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>There's nowhere better to watch whole
herds of wild horses go by.<sp:0:4:0>Is there something wrong with that? <sp:5:0:0>I love
horses, so I come here to see them in the
wild. It's that simple.
Talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Maybe I'm missing something, but I don't
see the <clr:0000>giant horse<clr:ffff> I was promised.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Bring the <clr:0000>giant horse<clr:ffff> here and you get
the <clr:0000>crystal<clr:ffff>. I can't make it any simpler
than that.
Talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But you know...<sp:5:0:0>there is something else
here almost as interesting as a horse.<sp:0:4:0>You know that one crumbled part of the
mountain where the ruins fell, next to the
<clr:0000>stone shrine<clr:ffff> a little ways down this hill?<sp:0:4:0>I found this <clr:0000>mysterious crystal <clr:ffff>that
must've fallen as well. And as soon as I
saw it, I had a genius idea.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Look at the way this crystal glitters. Don't
you think that would look handsome on
a horse?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I could prop it up in the saddle <sp:5:0:0>or attach
it to the harness...<sp:5:1:0>whatever makes the
horse look most incredible.
Talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Bring the <clr:0000>giant horse<clr:ffff> here and you get
the <clr:0000>crystal<clr:ffff>. I can't make it any simpler
than that.
Talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Look at the way this crystal glitters. Don't
you think that would look handsome on
a horse?<sp:0:4:0>But now I've got a big decision to make.<sp:5:0:0>
What kind of setup would make the horse
look MOST incredible?
Talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Thank you so much for introducing me to
this wonderful, once-in-a-lifetime horse.<sp:0:4:0>I was thinking about using this crystal to
make my horse the best-looking beast
the world's ever seen.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>But when I saw that giant stallion you
showed me, I realized I'd been a fool.<sp:0:4:0>There's no improving on a horse—any
horse. They're perfect to begin with.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>So I won't be needing the crystal. <sp:5:0:0>You can
do whatever you like with it.
Talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Makes sense. As a fellow horse-lover,
you'd also want to deck out your favorite
steed with one. <sp:5:0:0>I get it.
But just because I get it <sp:5:0:0>doesn't mean
I'm going to hand it over, no questions
asked.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though...maybe you can help me out.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>I've been hearing talk about an <clr:0000>enormous
horse<clr:ffff> spotted in this region.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>I'd love the chance to see this <clr:0000>giant horse<clr:ffff>
for myself, <sp:5:0:0>but I haven't had any luck
so far.<sp:0:4:0>But here you are. <sp:5:0:0>From one horse-lover
to another, I have a proposal.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Chat_01>If you can bring me that <clr:0000>gigantic horse<clr:ffff>,
the crystal is all yours.<sp:0:4:0>And I'm not going to leave you to search
without a single hint either. You should
ask around at the nearby <clr:0000>stables<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>A ways down the road east from here is
<clr:0000>Highland Stable<clr:ffff>. You could try there.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Lots of people gather at stables. They're
good places to get tips straight from the
horse's mouth.
Talk0018_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>Oh. Just a two-legs. <sp:5:1:0>Are you a fellow
horse-spotter?<sp:5:0:0>
Talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sure, see you later. <sp:5:0:0>And if you get any
good ideas about how to accessorize a
horse with a giant crystal, I'm listening.
Talk0035_01:
You'll find it faster with some help, so try
asking around at the nearby <clr:0000>stables<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>A ways down the road east from here is
<clr:0000>Highland Stable<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>You could try there.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Lots of people gather at stables. They're
good places to get tips straight from the
horse's mouth.
Talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>No offense, but horses are better than
anything, including you and me.<sp:0:4:0>I only got out of bed today to watch the
horses as they prance a little farther
along this ridge.
Talk0041: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh! That's quite a friend you have there.
Talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Whoa! <sp:5:0:0>Now that's a scary-looking mount.<sp:5:1:0>
But what's this? <sp:5:0:0>It's a monster and a
horse too?<sp:0:4:0>It's got good bones, but not much else.
<sp:5:0:0>Still, kudos for taming such an ominous
beast of a horse.
Talk0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Oh! That's quite a friend you have there.<sp:5:0:0>
I don't need to look at you to see how
you care for it. <sp:5:0:0>Its eyes tell the story.
Talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If you're wondering, I still haven't made
up my mind about the best way to use
this crystal to give a horse some pizzazz.
